nodes.text: A mining station was one of several such space stations located in the asteroid field of the Rapacc system, utilized by the Paccosh. When the Chiss Ascendancy starships Vigilant and Springhawk entered the star system, the Nikardun Destiny, who were blockading the planet Rapacc, sent a group of Paccosh to investigate the station in case its sensors picked up details on the Chiss vessels. Senior Captain Mitth'raw'nuruodo and the caregiver Mitth'ali'astov met the Paccosh aboard the station.
While aboard the station, Uingali foar Marocsaa entrusted Thrawn with a ring bearing a depiction of a chimaera, which would eventually become Thrawn's personal symbol.
